msignal.Signal<TSlot, TListener>

type
class
subclasses
msignal.Signal1
metadata
:keep
A Signal manages a list of listeners, which are executed when the signal is dispatched.

Constructor

new(?valueClasses : Array<Dynamic>)

Instance Variables

valueClasses : Array<Dynamic>

Instance Methods

add(listener : TListener) : TSlot

parameters
listener A function matching the signature of TListener
returns
The added listener slot
Subscribes a listener for the signal.

remove(listener : TListener) : TSlot

parameters
listener The listener to remove
returns
The removed listener slot
Unsubscribes a listener from the signal.
